title: Bronze Gear
source: [[File:bronzearmor.png|alt=|thumb|312x312px|Player wearing a set of Bronze Armor]] Bronze gear is the first tier of gear available in Eterspire. They require level 1 [[Combat Skill|Combat]] to wear. They are dropped by [[Monsters Level 1 - 9]] or can be purchased from [[Roy & Leila's Shop]] or [[Ameline's Random Shop]]. Bronze gear is upgraded using [[Bronze Shards]].
